Standard Items

Each item provides its own dimensions and position using the standard fields: { row: row, column: column, width: width, height: height }.

  • ,
    x

Custom Items

Each item provides its own dimensions but with custom fields: { position: [row, column], size: { x: width, y: height }}

  • ,
    x

Empty Items

Each item stores the standard options as an object within itself: { grid: {row: row, column: column, width: width, height: height }}
